runs.comm: short of length, on the hips, clipped past square leg for a boundary. Free gift.
better, fuller, around the off stump, Tharanga eases it to cover
First-ball duck! Short and a touch outside the off stump, Jayasuriya jumped at the opportunity to play his favourite cut shot but hit it straight to the man at deep point. What a start for Bangladesh
on a length, around the off stump - excellent line and length, left alone
short in length, outside the off stump, punched to cover
fuller, on the middle, straightens, worked through midwicket
teasing line outside the off stump, full in length, hint of movement away, pushed to point
nagging line again - full and just outside off, left alone
dropped by Rahim, standing upto the stumps. Short in length, outside the off stump, Sangakkara shapes to cut and bottom-edges it to Rahim's pad. Very very difficult chance.
keeps low again, in the zone outside off stump, Sangakkara misses and so does Rahim
short of length, coming in from outside th off stump, cut to point
short in length, slanting away from Tharanga who guides it past backward point
on that off stump again, pushed to cover point
short and outside the off stump, Tharanga cut it to the ground, down to the man at deep point.
fuller, on the off stump line, Sangakkara opens the bat-face to steer it to backward point
on the middle stump line, off a short of length, Sangakkara tries to work it to the on side, the bat-face shuts early and the ball bobs up down the track
fuller, on the middle and leg, allows Sangakkara to thrust his front foot forward and pick it up over wide midwicket.
angles away from Tharanga who pokes inside the line and is beaten by the late movement
on the off stump, worked to midwicket for a single. First runs off the bat off Rasel
again on that off stump line, mistimes a drive to mid-on
a tad short in length, just outside the off stump, Tharanga waited on the ball before square driving it on the up through cover point. Very skilful stroke.
full again, on that off stump line, Tharanga who played the previous delivery with such soft hands, goes hard at this one and edges it onto the pad
well outside off stump, full, slashed to deep point.
short in length, outside the off stump, Tharanga pulls it through midwicket.
shuffles right across the sticks,  heaves a length delivery on the off stump past square leg
on the off and middle, off a length, pushed to point
charges down the track, backing away to the leg-side in the process and flat-bats a short-of-length delivery over cover
full in length, outside the off stump, punched to point
on the middle and off, Sanga shuffles across, wrists it to square leg
What a freaky catch! Tharanga edges an intended swipe across the line and a hopping Rahim somehow, manages to squeeze it between his thighs! See it in the Youtube.
moves away from Jayawardene who is beaten by the angle
on the off stump line , pushed to backward point
on the middle stump line, wristed past square leg
short in length, pulled to wide midwicket
full and angling away from Jayasuriya who is beaten on the drive
low full-toss on the off, eased back to the bowler
fullish and outside the off, eased through cover
very full and on the pads, clipped through midwicket rather easily

short of a good length and on the stumps, worked through the on side, once again the batsmen look for the second. There's a good pick up and throw from Aftab Ahmed. The wicketkeeper collects and looks to break the stumps but Mushfiqur Rahim drops the ball. Had he made clean contact that was a sure run out
back of a length and on the pads, clipped through square-leg, Jayawardene waiting on the ball and playing late
fullish and on the stumps, driven hard at, off a thick inside edge through square-leg
flat offbreak on the stumps, no turn on that occasion, played down towards long-on
short of a length, on the stumps, cut played and missed, a bit of an edge, the ball lodges between the flap of pad and the keeper's leg. He grabs at it and grasses the chance
short and quite wide outside the off, Jayawardene backs away to leg and tries to cut but can't reach the ball
back of a length and on the off, pull played and missed, off the toe of the bat to the off side
full and on the off, driven down to long-on
in the slot on the off stump, Jayawardene walks across his stumps and heaves the ball over the leg side
full and on the pads, eased down to long-on
flat and on the pads, lap swept down to fine-leg
very full and on the leg stump, clipped away nicely through the on side, there is cover on the ropes though
short of a length and outside the off, cut hard but straight to point
flat and on the stumps, again Jayawardene heaves over the leg side, there are two men on the ropes, though, just for that shot

Gone! Sangakkara charges down the pitch and is beaten completely in the flight as he looks for the big hit. He misses and the bowler is right on target. There isn't even work for the keeper as the ball pegs back off stump. Excellent bit of spin bowling here.
short of a length and on the off, a bit of extra bounce and turn there and Chamara Silva can only cut awkwardly to the off side
full and quite straight, eased towards midwicket for a single
flat and on the off, slightly quicker too, defended back down the pitch
just short of a good length and on the off, driven slightly uppishly, through the line, towards cover
on the stumps, tossed up a touch, Chamara Silva sweeps but won't get too many
short and a bit of width, cut down to point
Sweet hit! The moment Chamara Silva struck that ball, going down on one knee, you knew it was going far. That came off the meat of the bat and sailed over midwicket
short of a good length and on the stumps, defended to leg
from round the stumps, seam-up delivery outside the off stump, backs to the leg-side and tries to cut but misses
fuller, outside off stump, lunges forward to drive
steps down the track and drives past the bowler
slower in the air, short in length, outside off stump, cut to deep- point
full in length, outside the off stump, Silva goes back to cut it through cover point
quicker one, goes on straight and past the outside edge. Good variation.
moves to the leg-side and cuts a length delivery on the off stump past point. There is a misfield and the batsmen rush back for the second run
charges out and drills a short of length delivery through cover. There is a despairing dive near the ropes but can't stop the ball
goes for a sweep and it runs off the pad
comes in from outside off, bounces high as Silva goes down on his knee to sweep and the ball hits him on the chest. Rahim screams for a lbw but it was going over
fuller and again Silva is beaten on the sweep shot. There is a shout for lbw but it was going down the leg side
third time lucky. Full and straight, Silva fails to connect with his sweep again and this time is caught in front
moves to leg-side, cuts a length delivery on middle and off to backward point
charges out, the bowler slows up the pace and he slices it just over the cover fielder.
comes down the track, can't reach the pitch, still goes for the lofted shot and the ball falls short of long-off

dropped by Shakib at cover. Jayawardene came down the track and slapped a short-of-length delivery uppishly to left of cover where Shakib took a few steps before flinging himself with both arms outstretched but can't hold on. It would have been a fantastic catch
on the off stump line, cut to backward point
full and outside off stump, square-driven uppishly to left of backward point
Jayawardene continues to struggle with his timing. He came down the track and sliced one over point. There is an overthrow
quick arm-ball, outside the off stump beats the intended cut shot
slower in the air, outside off stump cut to right of point and they go through for a quick single and a wayward throw allows Jayawardene to make it in time
well outside the off stump - he saw Jayawardene coming out and pushed it wide
a struggling Mahela falls. Again down the track, again not reaching the pitch of a delivery outside off stump, goes through with his off drive but gets a inside edge back to the stumps
on the middle and off, pushed to long-on
outside the off stump, steered to backward point
shorter, homing in on the middle, punched down the ground
outside the off stump, full, cut through point
full and straight, on driven to long-on where Rasel attacks the ball and fires in an quick throw back to Rahim.
outside the off stump, on a length, late-cut to short third man
full and just outside off stump, mistimes a drive to extra cover
full and outside  off stump, tapped to short third man
arm-ball, outside the off stump, cut through point
another cut shot to deep point, another single. Bangladesh would be happy to give away singles at this stage
full and on the legstump line, tries to whip it away to the on side but it runs off the pad
on that off stump, cut to right of short third man.
starts off with a yorker, stabbed away to the off side
fullish, homing in on the off stump, mistimes a swipe towards square leg
finally, a boundary. Width offered outside off and thrashed over backward point
low full toss, on the middle and off, swat-pulled over the bowler' head
short in length, Mubarak shapes to pull and edges it to third man
ah the lap shot makes an appearance. full and on the middle stump line, he went down on his knee and paddle-scooped it over short fine leg
attempted yorker ends as a low dipping full toss, Mubarak backs away and tries to drive through off and edges it through fine leg
another yorker, dug out towards mid-on
falls short of the blockhole and Mubarak gets under the ball and lofts it straight over the bowler's head
dropped by Aftab at sweeper cover. Fullish, outside off, sliced away in the air and Aftab rushes to his right and dives but ends up palming the ball over the ropes. Very difficult chance
yorker, on the middle and off, driven to right of long-off
full and outside off, tries to reverse sweep, misses and it hits him on the pad
swept past square leg for a single
another failed reverse sweep. The ball strikes him on the pad
comes down the track and drives for a single
threatens to charge and the bowler floats it wide of off stump
will just get a single with a drive to long-on
short and outside off, Dilshan goes back and across to cut it past point
